cleaned_text: Rite Aid Allergy Relief Capsules, 25mg - 100 ct SKU 0334951 Rite Aid Exclusive $12.99 FSA/HSA eligible Roll over or click image to zoom in From the Manufacturer PRODUCT DETAILS Item No. 0334951 Dramatically reduce cold and allergy symptoms with Rite Aid Allergy Relief. To provide fast-acting relief, Rite Aid Allergy Relief Medication is designed in an easy-to-swallow minitab.
